metadata.title: CVE-2021-46658 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
save_window_function_values in MariaDB before 10.6.3 allows an application crash because of incorrect handling of with_window_func=true for a subquery.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-46658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmariadb3 - 1:10.5.12-1build1
libmariadbd19 - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-backup - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-client - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-client-10.5 - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-client-core-10.5 - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-common - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-cracklib-password-check - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-gssapi-client - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-gssapi-server - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-rocksdb - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-s3 - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-server - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-server-10.5 - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-server-core-10.5 - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-test - 1:10.5.12-1build1
mariadb-test-data - 1:10.5.12-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:10.5.12-1build1').
